entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending after midnight then clearing. Local blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
